entry.title: WIND WARNING , Cape Race
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:23 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cape Race 03:30 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

Humidity: 75 %

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6 except minus 10 inland.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 6 except minus 10 inland. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature rising to 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain at times heavy beginning near midnight. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 in the evening then becoming south 70 gusting to 90 except gusting to 110 over exposed areas overnight. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023
